description:
Warmth and control for shoulder season commutes or training rides. The Amfib Lite gloves pack maximum warmth with minimum bulk to control your bike without freezing your fingers.

  • AmFIB soft shell outer fabric is wind- and water-resistant
  • 60g Primaloft Gold insulation with Aerogel particles for maximum warmth
  • Insulation is made with 35% recycled polyester
  • Soft fleece inner moves moisture outward
  • Synthetic leather palm provides grip on wet bars
  • Super soft nose wipe keeps things tidy
  • Hook-and-loop strap keeps gloves in-place
name: Pearl Izumi AMFIB Lite Gloves - Unisex
